name: Fireworks New Year
description:
Fireworks New Year is a 2D fireworks simulator, inspired by and created to celebrate the new year! 4 different settings, dozens of unique fireworks and flares, and and tens of thousands of particles, waiting for you to discover and play with them.
But wait there is more! Try out the slow motion mode and watch the pyrotechnics explode slooowly.
What are you waiting for? Download now and start creating your own fireworks shows.

Controls:
F12 - Full screen
TAB - Show/Hide side panel
LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - spawn firework
SPACE (HOLD) - slow down time

System requirements:
64 bit CPU, OpenGL 3 GPU driver
Windows 7 or higher / Linux or BSD x11
100 MB free storage for optimal functionality
